parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**. Maximum value: **100**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the application. You can specify the status of the applications that you want to query. After an application is created, it enters the **Normal** state. Valid values:

*   **Normal**
*   **Disable**
